LanguageData.AttendedFuneral.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.AttendedFuneral.comps.0.label: moral guide present
LanguageData.AttendedFuneral.comps.1.label: participant count
LanguageData.AttendedFuneral.outcomeChances.0.label: Terrible
LanguageData.AttendedFuneral.outcomeChances.0.descrip: The {0} was a terrible! Everyone felt insulted for having had to endure it.
LanguageData.AttendedFuneral.outcomeChances.1.label: Lackluster
LanguageData.AttendedFuneral.outcomeChances.1.descrip: The {0} was lackluster. The speech was long-winded and failed to resolve any emotions.
LanguageData.AttendedFuneral.outcomeChances.2.label: Good
LanguageData.AttendedFuneral.outcomeChances.2.descrip: The {0} was good. The speaker's final words provided a path for everyone move on.
LanguageData.AttendedFuneral.outcomeChances.3.label: Heartwarming
LanguageData.AttendedFuneral.outcomeChances.3.descrip: The {0} was heartwarming. The speech was captivating and heartfelt, and everyone came away focused on good memories.
LanguageData.AttendedFuneralNoCorpse.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.AttendedFuneralNoCorpse.comps.0.label: moral guide present
LanguageData.AttendedFuneralNoCorpse.comps.1.label: participant count
LanguageData.AttendedFuneralNoCorpse.outcomeChances.0: The {0} was a terrible! Everyone felt insulted for having had to endure it.
LanguageData.AttendedFuneralNoCorpse.outcomeChances.1: The {0} was lackluster. The speech was long-winded and failed to resolve any emotions.
LanguageData.AttendedFuneralNoCorpse.outcomeChances.2: The {0} was good. The speaker's final words provided a path for everyone move on.
LanguageData.AttendedFuneralNoCorpse.outcomeChances.3: The {0} was heartwarming. The speech was captivating and heartfelt, and everyone came away focused on good memories.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.comps.2.label: moral guide present
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.comps.3.label: participant count
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.comps.4.label: started at altar
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.extraPredictedOutcomeDe: If the {0} is satisfying, the blinded person might get a psylink upgrade or unlock new psychic powers.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.outcomeChances.0.label: Terrible
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.outcomeChances.0.descri: The {0} was terrible! The speech was stuttering and incoherent. The blinding technique was botched. Everyone was waiting for it to end.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.outcomeChances.1.label: Boring
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.outcomeChances.1.descri: The {0} was boring. The speech was repetitive and the blinding technique was noticeably flawed. It just didn't feel dignified.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.outcomeChances.2.label: Satisfying
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.outcomeChances.2.descri: The {0} was satisfying. The speech felt meaningful, and the blinding technique was precise and dignified.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.outcomeChances.2.potent: The blinded person will get a psylink upgrade or unlock a new psychic power.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.outcomeChances.3.label: Spectacular
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.outcomeChances.3.descri: The {0} was spectacular! The speech brought everyone to the edge of a frenzy just as the eye came out with a satisfying wet noise.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.outcomeChances.3.potent: The blinded person will get a psylink upgrade or unlock a new psychic power.
LanguageData.CelebratedDate.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.CelebratedDate.comps.2.label: leader present
LanguageData.CelebratedDate.comps.3.label: participant count
LanguageData.CelebratedDate.comps.4.label: started at altar
LanguageData.CelebratedDate.outcomeChances.0.label: Terrible
LanguageData.CelebratedDate.outcomeChances.0.descript: The {0} was terrible! Participants endured hours of jaw-clenching small talk while waiting for it to end.
LanguageData.CelebratedDate.outcomeChances.1.label: Boring
LanguageData.CelebratedDate.outcomeChances.1.descript: The {0} was boring. Everyone felt too awkward to open up and laugh.
LanguageData.CelebratedDate.outcomeChances.2.label: Fun
LanguageData.CelebratedDate.outcomeChances.2.descript: The {0} was fun. Everyone appreciated the chance to relax and have fun together.
LanguageData.CelebratedDate.outcomeChances.3.label: Unforgettable
LanguageData.CelebratedDate.outcomeChances.3.descript: The {0} was unforgettable! Everyone learned about each other and felt like a family.
LanguageData.CelebratedDate_Consumable.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.CelebratedDate_Consumable.comps.0.label: participant count
LanguageData.CelebratedDate_Consumable.comps.1.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.CelebratedDate_Consumable.extraPredicted: If the {0} is satisfying, one participant might gain an inspiration.
LanguageData.CelebratedDate_Consumable.outcomeChances: The {0} was terrible! Participants endured hours of jaw-clenching small talk while waiting for it to end.
The {0} was boring. Everyone felt too awkward to open up and laugh.
The {0} was good. Everyone appreciated the chance to relax and have fun together.
There's a 5% chance that a random participant gains an inspiration.
The {0} was unforgettable! Everyone learned about each other and felt like a family.
There's a 10% chance a random participant gains an inspiration.
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceDrum.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceDrum.comps.0.label: participant count
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceDrum.comps.1.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceDrum.comps.2.label: played drum count
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceDrum.comps.3.label: started at campfire
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceDrum.extraPredicted: If the {0} is fun or unforgettable, participants may gain increased work speed for a while.
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceDrum.outcomeChances: The {0} was terrible! Awkward conversation, bad jokes, atrocious dancing, and dull music.
The {0} was boring. Bad dancing and so-so music made the whole thing feel like a waste of time.
The {0} was fun. Everyone enjoyed the break from everyday life and got in some good dancing together.
Everyone felt refreshed after their trance-like dancing experience. Participants will work faster for a while.
The {0} was unforgettable! The dancers forgot themselves in the music, and the experience brought everyone together.
Everyone felt refreshed after their trance-like dancing experience. Participants will work faster for a while.
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceTech.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceTech.comps.0.label: participant count
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceTech.comps.1.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceTech.comps.2.label: active speaker count
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceTech.comps.3.label: started at lightball
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceTech.extraPredicted: If the {0} is fun or unforgettable, participants may gain increased work speed for a while.
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceTech.outcomeChances: The {0} was terrible! Awkward conversation, bad jokes, atrocious dancing, and dull music.
The {0} was boring. Bad dancing and so-so music made the whole thing feel like a waste of time.
The {0} was fun. Everyone enjoyed the break from everyday life and got in some good dancing together.
Everyone felt refreshed after their trance-like dancing experience. Participants will work faster for a while.
The {0} was unforgettable! The dancers forgot themselves in the music, and the experience brought everyone together.
Everyone felt refreshed after their trance-like dancing experience. Participants will work faster for a while.
LanguageData.CelebrationSkyLanterns.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.CelebrationSkyLanterns.comps.0.label: participant count
LanguageData.CelebrationSkyLanterns.extraInfoLines.0: Each participant will make a lantern out of 4 wood.
LanguageData.CelebrationSkyLanterns.extraPredictedOut: If the {0} is beautiful or unforgettable, the skylanterns might attract a group of friendly visitors.
The {0} was terrible! People kept getting annoyed making the lanterns and they looked like garbage on the wind.
The {0} was unimpressive. Lantern-making took too long and it all felt rather pointless.
The {0} was beautiful. The drifting lanterns made everyone feel at peace.
The skylanterns lifted high and bright. Friendly visitors might see them and arrive with a gift.
The {0} was unforgettable! Making the lanterns was a time of laughter, and everyone's spirits rose with them.
The skylanterns lifted high and bright. Friendly visitors might see them and arrive with a gift.
LanguageData.ConnectToTree.description: The connector will connect to the tree.
LanguageData.ConnectToTree.comps.0.label: participant count
LanguageData.ConnectToTree.extraPredictedOutcomeDescr: The connector will start with 25-45% connection strength, depending on ritual quality.
Every 2% increase in quality will grow a patch of Gauranlen moss around the tree, beautifying the area.
LanguageData.Conversion.description: If it goes well, target's ideoligion certainty will be reduced or they will convert. If it goes badly, they will gain certainty in their old beliefs.
LanguageData.Conversion.comps.0.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.Conversion.comps.1.label: participant count
LanguageData.Conversion.comps.2.label: {PAWN_labelShort}'s social impact
LanguageData.Conversion.comps.3.label: {PAWN_labelShort}'s expectations
LanguageData.Conversion.outcomeChances.0.label: Terrible
LanguageData.Conversion.outcomeChances.0.description: The {0} was terrible! From the first word, it was a fruitless back-and-forth argument. It dragged on for a cringe-inducingly long time.
LanguageData.Conversion.outcomeChances.1.label: Ineffective
LanguageData.Conversion.outcomeChances.1.description: The {0} was ineffective. Most of the arguments were unclear, and the convertee countered those that made sense.
LanguageData.Conversion.outcomeChances.2.label: Effective
LanguageData.Conversion.outcomeChances.2.description: The {0} was effective. The speech not only delivered solid arguments and visibly swayed the convertee's thoughts, but kept the crowd entertained as well.
LanguageData.Conversion.outcomeChances.3.label: Masterful
LanguageData.Conversion.outcomeChances.3.description: The {0} was masterful! Old beliefs seemed to dissolve effortlessly and inevitably, and our true knowledge was accepted.
LanguageData.DestroyConsumableBuilding.description: The ritual target will be destroyed.

LanguageData.DestroyConsumableBuilding.comps.1.label: room impressiveness
LanguageData.DestroyConsumableBuilding.outcomeChances: The {0} was terrible! Participants endured hours of jaw-clenching small talk while waiting for it to end.
The {0} was boring. Everyone felt too awkward to open up and laugh.
The {0} was good. Everyone appreciated the chance to relax and have fun together.
There's a 5% chance that a random participant gains an inspiration.
The {0} was unforgettable! Everyone learned about each other and felt like a family.
There's a 10% chance a random participant gains an inspiration.

LanguageData.Execution.description: Spectating slaves will be 100% suppressed. Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.Execution.comps.0.label: participant count
LanguageData.Execution.comps.1.label: started at altar or ideogram
LanguageData.Execution.outcomeChances.0.label: Awkward
LanguageData.Execution.outcomeChances.0.description: The {0} was awkward. The speech dragged on and when it came time to strike, the executioner slipped and barely recovered. None of it felt justified.
LanguageData.Execution.outcomeChances.1.label: Satisfying
LanguageData.Execution.outcomeChances.1.description: The {0} was satisfying. Everyone could feel that justice was being upheld.
LanguageData.Execution.outcomeChances.2.label: Spectacular
LanguageData.Execution.outcomeChances.2.description: The {0} was spectacular! One smooth strike was all it took, and everyone felt a rush of justice and power.
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.comps.0.label: participant count
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.comps.1.label: leader present
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.comps.2.label: duelist dies
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.comps.3.label: weapon used
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.extraPredictedOutcomeDescr: Duelists and viewers will gain melee combat experience.
Spectators will gain a mood boost and fill their recreation bars.
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.outcomeChances.0.label: Terrible
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.outcomeChances.0.descripti: The duel was terrible! The fighters bumbled around, ineptly avoiding each other in a extended display of cowardice and weakness. Watching it just made people sad.
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.outcomeChances.1.label: Boring
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.outcomeChances.1.descripti: The duel was boring. The fighters wouldn't commit, so there were no exciting moments.
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.outcomeChances.2.label: Good
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.outcomeChances.2.descripti: The duel was good. The fighters went for blood and showed real heart.
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.outcomeChances.3.label: Unforgettable
LanguageData.GladiatorDuel.outcomeChances.3.descripti: The duel was unforgettable! Both fighters gave all they had, and the death showed their dedication.
LanguageData.RoleChange.description: A new role will be assigned to a colonist.
LanguageData.RoleChange.comps.0.label: required spectator count
LanguageData.RoleChange.extraPredictedOutcomeDescript: The required number of spectators must attend for the role change to apply.
LanguageData.RoleChange.outcomeChances.0.label: Failed
LanguageData.RoleChange.outcomeChances.0.description: The role change was not attended by enough {IDEO_memberNamePlural}.
LanguageData.RoleChange.outcomeChances.1.label: Successful
LanguageData.RoleChange.outcomeChances.1.description: The role change ritual was completed.
LanguageData.Sacrifice.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.Sacrifice.comps.2.label: moral guide present
LanguageData.Sacrifice.comps.3.label: participant count
LanguageData.Sacrifice.comps.4.label: started at altar
LanguageData.Sacrifice.extraPredictedOutcomeDescripti: If the {0} is satisfying, one of the participants might gain an inspiration.
LanguageData.Sacrifice.outcomeChances.0.label: Terrible
LanguageData.Sacrifice.outcomeChances.0.description: The {0} was terrible! The speech was stuttering and incoherent, and the killing technique was botched. The victim took far too long to die - everyone was waiting for it to end.
LanguageData.Sacrifice.outcomeChances.1.label: Boring
LanguageData.Sacrifice.outcomeChances.1.description: The {0} was boring. The speech was repetitive and the killing technique was noticeably flawed. It just didn't feel dignified.
LanguageData.Sacrifice.outcomeChances.2.label: Satisfying
LanguageData.Sacrifice.outcomeChances.2.description: The {0} was satisfying. The speech felt meaningful, and the killing technique was precise and dignified.
LanguageData.Sacrifice.outcomeChances.2.potentialExtr: There's a 5% chance that a random participant gets an inspiration.
LanguageData.Sacrifice.outcomeChances.3.label: Spectacular
LanguageData.Sacrifice.outcomeChances.3.description: The {0} was spectacular! The speech brought everyone to the edge of a frenzy just as the blade came down perfectly, and the spurting blood was like cleansing waters for the spirit.
LanguageData.Sacrifice.outcomeChances.3.potentialExtr: There's a 10% chance that a random participant gets an inspiration.
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.comps.2.label: moral guide present
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.comps.3.label: participant count
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.comps.4.label: started at altar
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.outcomeChances.0.d: The {0} was terrible! The speech was stuttering and incoherent, and the scarification technique was botched. Everyone was waiting for it to end.
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.outcomeChances.1.d: The {0} was boring. The speech was repetitive and the scarification technique was noticeably flawed. It just didn't feel dignified.
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.outcomeChances.2.d: The {0} was satisfying. The speech felt meaningful, and the scarification technique was precise and dignified.
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.outcomeChances.3.d: The {0} was spectacular! The speech brought everyone to the edge of a frenzy as the bladeholder artfully rended living flesh.
LanguageData.Trial.description: The trial quality determines the chance that the defendant will be convicted.
LanguageData.Trial.comps.0.label: participant count
LanguageData.Trial.comps.1.label: {PAWN_labelShort}'s negotiation ability
LanguageData.Trial.comps.2.label: {PAWN_labelShort}'s negotiation ability
LanguageData.Trial.outcomeChances.0.label: exonerated
LanguageData.Trial.outcomeChances.0.description: The prosecutor {PROSECUTOR_labelShort}'s arguments failed to convince anyone. {PAWN_labelShort} was exonerated.
LanguageData.Trial.outcomeChances.1.label: convicted
LanguageData.Trial.outcomeChances.1.description: The prosecution convinced everyone of {PAWN_labelShort}'s guilt. {PAWN_labelShort} was convicted and can now be punished. You may execute or banish {PAWN_objective} and nobody will mind.
LanguageData.TrialMentalState.description: The trial quality determines the chance that the defendant will be convicted.
LanguageData.TrialMentalState.comps.0.label: participant count
LanguageData.TrialMentalState.comps.1.label: {PAWN_labelShort}'s negotiation ability
LanguageData.TrialMentalState.outcomeChances.0.label: exonerated
LanguageData.TrialMentalState.outcomeChances.0.descri: The prosecutor {PROSECUTOR_labelShort}'s arguments failed to convince anyone. {PAWN_labelShort} was exonerated.
LanguageData.TrialMentalState.outcomeChances.1.label: convicted
LanguageData.TrialMentalState.outcomeChances.1.descri: The prosecution convinced everyone of {PAWN_labelShort}'s guilt. {PAWN_labelShort} was convicted and can now be punished. You may execute or banish {PAWN_objective} and nobody will mind.
